How to train your dog

  • Homepage
  • Page 1

  • Page 4

First to train your dog you have to teach him or she to sit. To do this you will have to shout at the dog if that doesnt work then point your finger aswell as shouting at the dog.There are loads of things that you can teach your dog to do like teaching them to lie down or teaching them to roll over.To teach your dog how to high five you get a treat and tell them to shake a paw or high five and they should do it if not keep trying and trying again untill it works.there is many more things to know.
